Summary: looked lik a small white dot, or as desribed like a diamond or star-like
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Brockton
There were no other sightings in Brockton on or around May 24th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI sat on my step waiting for my girlfriend to get home, and about 3 hawks wereflyin. One was at a distance another with it, and the third seemded to fly right above my home. I see hawks but not often and not 3 at a time so these birds kept my attention in the sky. I watched them glide for about 15-20 minutes and then once i veered my eyes away to see where the bird above my home was going i noticed a small little dot. Along with the many planes that were flying, this clearly wasn't a plane, it was far too small, and way above the altitude most planes i see flying. It did nothing strange, just the slow drift across the sky. At first I said well that can't be anything more than a piece of cloud, but then as it drifted under the cloud it became dark, as if the clouds cast a shadow. I immediately called my friend who claimed to have seen an ufo and described what i was seeing, and then the now dark object disappeared into the clouds. I was amazed to see for myself what i always here about and couldn't take my eyes from the sky with hopes to see this again so I could show my girlfriend. I definitely need a camcorder and a telescope now!
